channel.title: Omg! i hate this!
channel.description:
Ok i just made a shop and my compile says [code]client.java:17253: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
and i used this program: ShopMaker V1.0 by jay walker
it told me this: [code][Add under the '}' after 'WanneShop = 2;' in client.java] else if (NPCID == 1182) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 43; }
[Add in shops.cfg] 43 @whi@Shop_of@red@_HELL! 1 1 7158 999999999 6161 5000000 6151 5000000 6145 5000000 6130 5000000 6129 5000000 6128 5000000 1377 2000000
[Add in autospawn.cfg] 1182 3251 3434 03253 3437 3256 3433 1 Shop_of_Hell!!!!!
[/code]
Im so mad i need help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! PLZ ANY 1

item.title: Omg! i hate this!
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:10, topic:100866”]no it was the o that i forgot[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 10:45:25 AM[/size][hr][quote author=Zanzibar link=topic=144736.msg1381211#msg1381211 date=1180248092]
Coords Is Spelled Wrong… “Cords”
[/quote]
Well actually in java language cords is spelled with two “o”'s[/quote]thats not java language you idiot thats just a line of tekst if i wanted to have iit spelled whit 1 o i would change the public int nothing to do whit java language noob

Quick guess, look at this— else if (NPCID == 1182) { //Lord PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Shop of HELL See WanneShop43? Well open up shops.cfg and see if the wanneshop == ## …
replace the ## with the shop you added and look here- PutNPCCords = true;
what is in red is misspelled

item.title: Omg! i hate this!
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

Also my client lokks like this (the shop section)

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 1182) { //Lord PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Shop of HELL } else if (NPCID == 569) { //Silver Merchant Obby Shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Obsidian Shop } else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40; // Black Armour Shop } else if (NPCID == 551) { //Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //General Pk Store } else if (NPCID == 555) { //Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 3; //Weapon/Ammy Shop } else if (NPCID == 577) { //Cassie PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 4; //Falador Shield Shop

Thats just part of is the “lord” shop is wut i added its called “Shop of HELL!!”

item.title: Omg! i hate this!
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

Ok i just made a shop and my compile says

[code]client.java:17253: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable PutNPCCords
location: class client
PutNPCCords = true;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

and i used this program: ShopMaker V1.0 by jay walker

it told me this:

[code][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 1182) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 43;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
43 @whi@Shop_of@red@_HELL! 1 1 7158 999999999 6161 5000000 6151 5000000 6145 5000000 6130 5000000 6129 5000000 6128 5000000 1377 2000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
1182 3251 3434 03253 3437 3256 3433 1 Shop_of_Hell!!!

[/code]

Im so mad i need help!!!
PLZ ANY 1
